description: Position of first letter of n (in English) in alphabet.
comments: English name for n begins with a(n)-th letter.
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Chris Cole, Email to N. J. A. Sloane, Apr 23 1994 (contains many letter sequences, including the letter equivalent of A005606).
example: One begins with 'O' and 'O' is the fifteenth letter hence a(1)=15.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: More terms from Larry Reeves (larryr(AT)acm.org), Oct 02 2000
